text: Jugon-les-Lacs () is a former commune. It is in Brittany in the Côtes-d'Armor department in northwest France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Jugon-les-Lacs-Commune-Nouvelle.Arrêté préfectoral 27 November 2015 == Twin towns == * Lenzkirch, Germany == References == Category:Former communes in Côtes-d'Armor
title: Jugon-les-Lacs
